feed.title: Pinchflat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Add Apprise support by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/170
  • [Enhancement] Add more source options to output templates by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/172

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.9...v0.1.10

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Redownload new media after a delay by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/173
  • [Enhancement] Allow custom yt-dlp options by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/176

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.10...v0.1.11

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.12
entry.content:
[Bugfix] Force video to be overwritten so media redownloading works in all cases @kieraneglin

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.11...v0.1.12

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Allow overriding output templates on a per-source basis by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/179
  • [Housekeeping] Close system port when jobs are cancelled by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/182
  • [Enhancement] Improve support for 4k videos with Plex by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/181

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.12...v0.1.13

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix]: Fixed apprise notifications when fast indexing by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/187
  • [Enhancement] Improve embedded metadata date compatibility by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/188
  • [Bugfix]: Misc. bugfixes 2024-04-16 by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/189

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.13...v0.1.14
